name: OBVIO
description:
Move your paddle left and right and bounce your ball against the bricks to color and destroy them.

Hit your ball against a brick once to mark it with your color, hit a brick with your color to destroy it and get points. Hit bricks with your opponents' colors to change them to your color.

CONTROLS
  • Using Xbox 360 controllers, all 4 players play using left and right triggers and the A button.
  • Player 1 keyboard keys: arrow keys left, up, right
  • Player 2 keyboard keys: Q, W, E
  • Player 3 keyboard keys: V, B, N
  • Player 4 keyboard keys: I, O, P

OBVIO was made during the 2015 Nordic Game Jam by:

  • Emil Andersson
  • Viktória Papp
  • Kristian Hjaltason
  • Christian Sunesen
  • Steffen Christophersen
  • Daniel Jallov
  • Jan Skambraks
